headline: PPG Industries Inc (PPG) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Record EPS Growth and Strategic ...
summary: PPG Industries Inc (PPG) reports a 6% increase in adjusted EPS for 2024, driven by strong performance in Aerospace Coatings and strategic financial improvements.
